short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Access your bookmarks faster for keyboard users

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use Quickbar to navigate through your bookmarks faster with quick keyboard commands.

Use hotkeys to quickly activate the extension, and use tab/shift tab to navigate through your bookmarks without leaving your keyboard.

Perfect for people who want to work faster on the internet without having to move their hands from their keyboard, to the bookmarks bar.

For fastest performance, you will want to organize your bookmarks in order so you can quickly tab to the most frequently visited websites.
